TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlSchemaParticle extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotated

Docs.summary: Abstract class for that is the base class for all particle types (e.g. ).

remarks.format:
## Remarks Particle types are usually interchangeable. Particle can be a local element declaration or reference to a global element declaration (`element`), a compositor (`sequence`, `choice`, or `all`), a reference to a named content model group (`group`), or an element wildcard (`any`).
## Examples See <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>, or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup> for an example using this class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the maximum number of times the particle can occur.
Docs.value: The maximum number of times the particle can occur. The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value can be an integer greater than or equal to zero.

Docs.returns: The maximum number of times the particle can occur. The default is 1.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number as a string value. Maximum number of times the particle can occur.
Docs.value: The number as a string value. indicates that is equal to the default value. The default is a null reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property can have a null ("") value or `String.Empty`.
To set no limit on the maximum number, use the string "unbounded".

Docs.returns: The number as a string value. indicates that is equal to the default value. The default is a null reference.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum number of times the particle can occur.
Docs.value: The minimum number of times the particle can occur. The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value can be an integer greater than or equal to zero. Set this attribute to zero to indicate that the attribute is optional.

Docs.returns: The minimum number of times the particle can occur. The default is 1.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number as a string value. The minimum number of times the particle can occur.
Docs.value: The number as a string value. indicates that is equal to the default value. The default is a null reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property can have a null ("") value or `String.Empty`.

Docs.returns: The number as a string value. indicates that is equal to the default value. The default is a null reference.
